lines.text: My name is Manikkam. I do have another name...!
God puts good people into trouble, but will never let them down. Whereas he grants more for bad people, but will let them down.
When Badsha says once, it will echo a hundred times
If I see you here one more time I will bury you alive wherever I see you.
Your should have fear about life, but fear alone should not be your life.
Your life is in your hands.
